casebody.data:
Spivey, Appellee, v. Keller, Appellant, et al.

[Cite as Spivey v. Keller, 107 Ohio St.3d 100, 2005-Ohio-5973.]

(No. 2005-0180 Submitted October 12, 2005 Decided November 23, 2005.) Drake, Phillips, Kuenzli & Clark and William E. Clark, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Harrold v. Collier, 107 Ohio St.3d 44, 2005-Ohio-5334, 836 N.E.2d 1165.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell and Lanzinger, JJ., concur.
